org.apache.accumulo.test

Class FaultyConditionalWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.test.FaultyConditionalWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionalWriter

    public class FaultyConditionalWriter
extends Object
implements ConditionalWriter
    A writer that will sometimes return unknown. When it returns unknown the condition may or may not have been written.

    • Nested Class Summary
